claim(address,uint256).details: users can claim only after claim is started

params.beneficiary: the address that will receives claimed token

deposit(uint256).details: only owner can call this function

getClaimInfo(uint256).details: avoid first empty element of the array

params.index: index to get the claim info

getClaimInfoArray(uint256,uint256).details: avoid first empty element of the array

params.fromIndex: start index; should be greater than 0 (to avoid first empty element)

params.user: address to get the index of claim info

getClaimInfoLength().details: avoid first empty element of the array

params.user: the address of user to need to get the detail

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amounts: array of users' claimable token amount

params._liquidityMining: The address of the staking contract

params._staking: The address of the staking contract

stake(uint256,uint256).details: users can stake their token even when staking is disabled through this function

params.durationInMonths: the duration to be staken in months

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferTokenToLiquidityMining(uint256).details: callable only from liquidity minig contract itself

withdraw(uint256).details: only owner can call this function

claim(address,uint256).notice: User claims their purchased token to the particular address

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit token so that user can claim their token from this contract

getClaimInfo(uint256).notice: get the claim info at the particular index

getClaimInfoArray(uint256,uint256).notice: get the array of claim info between particular indexes

getClaimInfoIndex(address).notice: get the index in claim info array of particular user

getClaimInfoLength().notice: get the actual claims array length

getClaimableAmount(address).notice: Get the claimable amount of particular user

getTotalDeposits().notice: Get the total deposited amount of token by the owner

setClaim(address,uint256).notice: Set the detail of entry that can claim token

setClaimBatch(address[],uint256[]).notice: Set the batch of entry that can claim token

setClaimStart(uint256).notice: Set the time to start claiming

setLiquidityMiningContract(address).notice: Set the address of liquidity mining contract

setStakingContract(address).notice: Set the address of staking contract

stake(uint256,uint256).notice: User can stake their claimable token to the staking contract directly

transferTokenToLiquidityMining(uint256).notice: transfer sale tokens to liquidity mining contract for adding liquidity
